document_data.name: Street of Steel
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Street of Steel''' was a prominent avenue located in the [[City of Brass]] on the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}

This street was found within [[Keffinspires]].
document_data.Activity: The ring of hammers on steel dominated this avenue as [[azer]] smiths pounded out metallic weapons and armor for the [[efreeti]] legions. The azer worked around the clock for the [[Marrake al-Sidan al-Hariq ben Lazan|Sultan]] who would not allow them to take commissions from ''[[Midani dictionary|ins]]'' without his explicit permission, which he only gave on rare occasions.
